dmca.title: HomesForStudents complains its text has found another residence
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam,

1. 	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.homesforstudents.co.uk

2. 	In all instances below the whole or a substantial part of the textual content has been copied word for word. I am just listing some of the pages but the entire site infringes on my copyright:

Search Query / Infringing URL

Activate and deactivate your properties as and
when they become available / unavailable to let
If you are a landlord and you wish to advertise
your properties then register here to start
adding your properties!
www.roomymate.com/register.php

From being students ourselves, we remember
how difficult and time consuming it is to find
good quality student accommodation
www.roomymate.com/aboutus.php

To browse existing roommate profiles, choose
your city and the type of profiles you want to
see and click 'go'
www.roomymate.com/flatmate.php

"If you would rather not use the site yourself
then a registration and property form can be
requested by post"
www.roomymate.com/index2.php


Pages for general comparison (although some layout of site is different the content is the same):
HomesForStudents / Offending Site (roomymate.com)

www.homesforstudents.co.uk/landlordintro.aspx
www.roomymate.com/index2.php

www.homesforstudents.co.uk/register.aspx
http://www.roomymate.com/register.php

www.homesforstudents.co.uk/banner_adverts.aspx
http://www.roomymate.com/banner_ads.php

http://www.homesforstudents.co.uk/landlordreg.aspx
http://www.roomymate.com/register_landlord.php

http://www.homesforstudents.co.uk/regstudentaspx
http://www.roomymate.com/register_student.php

http://www.homesforstudents.co.uk/login.aspx
http://www.roomymate.com/login.php

http://www.homesforstudents.co.uk/find_student_roommate.aspx
http://www.roomymate.com/flatmate.php


3. 	My Contact Information: dave@homesforstudents.co.uk

4. 	Infringer's Contact Information:
Roomymate.com
[private]
[private]
Portsmouth,
Hants
POI 2DE
United Kingdom

Email: [private]rommymate.com
[private]@ntlworld.com [private]@gator125.hostgator.com

5. 	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. 	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[signed]

[private], Owner
HomesForStudents
Phone: +44 [private]
Email: [private]@homesforstudents.co.uk
